name: Elastic Face Recognition on AWS â€“ Scalable Cloud-Based AI System
description: A cloud based multi-tier application that performs face recognition on images and videos. The application uses AWS services like EC2, S3, SQS, Python and Flask to provide a scalable solution.

name: Voices Unheard - Hackathon 2nd Prize
description: An AI-driven platform where indeginous people affected by Arizona's Mining Industry can raise their concerns. The platform also provides a clustered view of issues which enables the Mining Corporations to take targeted actions.

name: ATMSeer - An AutoML analytics platform
description: A platform that enables users to upload their datasets and get the best model for their data. The platform also provides a detailed analysis of the data and the model.

name: LLM long range dependency resolver
description: A research study to resolve long range dependencies in extremely large datasets by performing prompt compression using selective context methodology.

name: Job Application Management System
description: A web application to manage job applications. The application has GMail API integration to automatically track and update the status of job applications based on emails from companies.

name: Traffic Sign Recognition System
description: A computer vision system to effectively identify traffic signs for real-time automated driver assistance.

name: Traffic Counter
description: An application that detects and counts vehicles in traffic using background separation techniques.

name: Emotion Analyzer
description: Classifies text into 11 categories of emotions. Used in directing the voice tone in a text-to-speech converter app.

name: Product recommendation system
description: Simple review classification model to smartly recommend products to users based on reviews.

name: Covid-19 Tracker
description: A simple web application to track the spread of Covid-19 across the globe.
